profile:
**MENTION HOMESTARS AT THE TIME OF BOOKING AND SAVE 10% OFF ADDITIONAL LABOUR BEYOND THE DIAGNOSTIC CHARGE **
What do we do? 
At Valley View Appliances we bring " Peace of Mind" to your appliance headaches.  Or aim is to give you Fast, Friendly, Trustworthy Service at a cost that is affordable.  No headaches.  
All of our service is proudly guaranteed and performed by government trained technicians. We have over 47 years of accumulated experience in repairing home appliances and we are authorized to perform warranty service for many manufacturers.  We pride ourselves in providing fast, trustworthy service at a reasonable rate. Our service vehicles are fully stocked with the most common parts, so that in most cases, we can finish your repairs on our first visit. We try our best to make your repair a quick and pleasant experience, knowing that a satisfied customer is a repeat customer.
We are pleased to serve Calgary and other areas, including: Cochrane, Airdrie, Springbank, and many others. If you have appliance repair needs, give us a call @ 
(403)247-9602 or book online on our website @ www.ValleyViewAppliances.com    

Needing you new Appliances installed?  You are in good hands as our installation professionals are true craftsmen and take pride in a job done with excellence.    Needing a installation quote please email: Installs@Vvapp.ca

profile:
The Appliance Force's team of Appliance professionals have over 30 years of experience providing Calgary appliance repair services.  With Appliance Force you will get professionally trained technicians who will deliver efficient and timely service tailored to your situation. From a washing machine repair to a refrigerator installation, our technicians will treat you and your home with respect. 

Each member of our repair team is a provincially registered professional technician, which means you can count on us to do the job right the first time. Our repair team is committed to exceptional customers service, so you can be guaranteed clean, friendly and profession service with every visit.


We promise to:
 •   Provide prompt, efficient, timely service
  •  Charge by the job not by the hour
  •  Guarantee on all work and  parts 

At Appliance Force we service all major household appliances including:
Washing Machines
Clothes Dryers
Refrigerators
Freezers
Dishwashers
Ovens, Ranges and Stoves

profile:
At Quality Appliance Repair, we've built our livelihoods on fixing all major house hold appliances: Washer, Dryer, Dish Washer, Fridge, Stove. 
Certified technicians, Our BlueBook is from The Major Appliance Services National Price Guide (MASPG) which is endorsed by the MSA, NARDA, and United Servicer's Association! so we don't charge by the minute like everyone else, once we find the problem the price is set in stone no matter how long it takes to do the job right. 
We can get your appliance back up and running and save you thousands on a new one. Our service is priority, and we look forward to servicing your needs.

We are service providers for large property management firms and believe just like they do that we will give you the best service in the Calgary area, we work a lot with landlords and tenants to find the best times to get your appliance fixed, we like to work with you and not jump through hoops to get a tech there, for this reason we work evenings and weekends on occasions that it is needed to service your appliances without you having to miss work or change your daily and busy schedule. 
So if you need a dryer repair, a fridge repair, dishwasher repair, washer repair, oven or stove repair we are the ones to call for Calgary, Strathmore, Langdon, and Chestermer.

profile:
We found honest and professional specialist in their fields and put them all together into the team to reach our main goal – provide you a better service.    

Appliance repair is a pretty simple job. It isn’t necessarily easy, but it’s simple: diagnose the machine, determine if it can be repaired easily or if something more complex is required (functional part replacement, electronic board repair, etc.), and let the customer know their options.

Many technicians we have seen are dishonest, trying to make smaller repairs bigger than they are so they can charge more. This hurts us because it hurts you, sowing the seeds of distrust and making people wary of calling help when they need it. We want to differentiate our business from those types of practices.

By being honest and truthful, our hope is that we will earn our customers trust and that they will recommend us to their friends and family. 

Thank you very much for considering us for your appliance repair needs. We promise to work hard and do right by you. It is our sincere wish that after a repair you don’t call us for a long time… that means that we did the job right!
name: Techvill Appliance Repair Ltd
